GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Generates marketing taglines for a new all-inclusive resort package.

templateVersions.content: You are a creative marketer at Coral Cloud Resort. The resort offers a luxurious all-inclusive package with gourmet dining, spa treatments, and exclusive excursions. Create three unique and compelling marketing taglines that highlight the resort's unique features and appeal to upscale travelers. Keep each tagline concise and engaging, aiming to evoke a sense of exclusivity and relaxation. Explain your thought process for each tagline step-by-step.
